description: A minimal iOS native Swift application template that integrates with AgentforceSDK for service agents. This template provides a foundation for building iOS apps that enable service agents to have conversations with customers using SwiftUI and the AgentforceSDK.
useCase: Use this template when you need to create a minimal iOS native app for service agents that integrates with AgentforceSDK. It's ideal for developers who want a simple starting point for building agent-facing applications with chat and conversation capabilities.

customizationPoints.description: Configure AgentforceSDK settings including ES developer name, organization ID, and API URL
instructions: Update Settings.swift with your ES developer name, organization ID, and API URL
Update CredentialProvider.swift with your credential handling logic
Configure ServiceUISettings for transcript download and conversation ending

customizationPoints.description: Customize the SwiftUI interface and chat experience
instructions: Modify AgentforceMainView.swift to customize the main UI layout
Update AgentforceViewModel.swift to add custom state management
Create custom theme manager by extending AgentforceDefaultThemeManager
Customize chat view appearance and behavior

customizationPoints.description: Customize credential provider and authentication flow
instructions: Update CredentialProvider.swift to implement your authentication mechanism
Modify AppDelegate.swift for custom app initialization
Configure credential refresh logic if needed
Add custom authentication UI if required

agentID.description: Agent ID from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration

developerName.description: ES developer name from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration

organizationId.description: Organization ID from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration

apiURL.description: API URL from your enhanced in-app chat deployment configuration
